tool.name: SAGA.statistics_regression.8
tool.description: Multiple Regression Analysis (Grid and Predictor Grids)
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEPENDENT False isArrayPREDICTORS True output_data_REGRESSION $output_data_REGRESSION output_data_RESIDUALS $output_data_RESIDUALS output_data_INFO_COEFF $output_data_INFO_COEFF output_data_INFO_MODEL $output_data_INFO_MODEL output_data_INFO_STEPS $output_data_INFO_STEPS name SAGA.statistics_regression.8 DEPENDENT $DEPENDENT PREDICTORS $PREDICTORS RESAMPLING $RESAMPLING COORD_X $COORD_X COORD_Y $COORD_Y METHOD $METHOD P_VALUE $P_VALUE CROSSVAL $CROSSVAL CROSSVAL_K $CROSSVAL_K prefer $prefer response $response outputType_REGRESSION $OutputSection_REGRESSION.outputType_REGRESSION transmissionMode_REGRESSION $OutputSection_REGRESSION.transmissionMode_REGRESSION outputType_RESIDUALS $OutputSection_RESIDUALS.outputType_RESIDUALS transmissionMode_RESIDUALS $OutputSection_RESIDUALS.transmissionMode_RESIDUALS outputType_INFO_COEFF $OutputSection_INFO_COEFF.outputType_INFO_COEFF transmissionMode_INFO_COEFF $OutputSection_INFO_COEFF.transmissionMode_INFO_COEFF outputType_INFO_MODEL $OutputSection_INFO_MODEL.outputType_INFO_MODEL transmissionMode_INFO_MODEL $OutputSection_INFO_MODEL.transmissionMode_INFO_MODEL outputType_INFO_STEPS $OutputSection_INFO_STEPS.outputType_INFO_STEPS transmissionMode_INFO_STEPS $OutputSection_INFO_STEPS.transmissionMode_INFO_STEPS

param.name: DEPENDENT
param.label: Dependent Variable
param.help: Dependent Variable The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png

param.name: PREDICTORS
param.label: Predictors
param.help: Predictors The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png

param.name: P_VALUE
param.label: Significance Level
param.help: Significance level (aka p-value) as threshold for automated predictor selection, given as percentage

param.name: CROSSVAL_K
param.label: Cross Validation Subsamples
param.help: number of subsamples for k-fold cross validation

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_REGRESSION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_RESIDUALS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_INFO_COEFF
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_INFO_MODEL
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_INFO_STEPS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Linear regression analysis of one grid as dependent and multiple grids as indepentent (predictor) variables. Details of the regression/correlation analysis will be saved to a table. Optionally the regression model is used to create a new grid with regression based values. The multiple regression analysis uses a forward selection procedure. <br/><br/>Reference:<br/>- Bahrenberg, G., Giese, E., Nipper, J. (1992): 'Statistische Methoden in der Geographie 2 - Multivariate Statistik', Stuttgart, 415p.<br/>
